00100000000000010000000000000000 //addi R1,R0,0
00100000000000100000000000000000 //addi R2,R0,0
00100000000000110000000000010100 //addi R3,R0,20
00000000010000110010000000101010 //slt R4,R2,R3
00010000100000000000000000001010 //beq R4,R0,Endfor
00000000001000010010100000100000 //add R5,R1,R1
00000000101000010010100000100000 //add R5,R5,R1
00000000101000010010100000100000 //add R5,R5,R1
10001100101001100000000011111010 //lw R6,1000(R5)
00000000001001100011100000101010 //slt R7,R1,R6
00010000111000000000000000000001 //beq R7,R0,If
00001000000000000000000000001111 //j Endif
00100000110000010000000000000000 //If: addi R1,R6,0
00100000010100000000000000000000 //addi R8,R1,0
00100000010000100000000000000001 //Endif: addi R2,R2,1
10101100000000010000000111110100 //Endfor: sw R1,2000(R0)
10101100000010000000000111110101 //sw R8,2004(R0)
